data.name: Design Award Costumes 2015 Set
data.detailed_description:
NOTICE

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.


About the Game

All-new costumes designed by awesome fans for the fighters of Dead or Alive! This content contains all costumes in the Design Award 2015 set. Thanks to all the fans for great costume ideas! Team Ninja has selected some of the top fan designs to add to Dead or Alive! Costumes for the following characters included: Kasumi, Ayane, Hitomi, Leifang, Kokoro, Tina, Helena, Christie, Momiji, Marie Rose, Nyotengu, Honoka, Jann Lee, Eliot, Bayman, Bass *You must have the latest update installed before using this costume. ©2015 Valve Corporation. Steam and the Steam logo are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Valve Corporation in the U.S. and/or other countries.
data.about_the_game:
All-new costumes designed by awesome fans for the fighters of Dead or Alive! This content contains all costumes in the Design Award 2015 set.
Thanks to all the fans for great costume ideas! Team Ninja has selected some of the top fan designs to add to Dead or Alive!

Costumes for the following characters included:
Kasumi, Ayane, Hitomi, Leifang, Kokoro, Tina, Helena, Christie, Momiji, Marie Rose, Nyotengu, Honoka, Jann Lee, Eliot, Bayman, Bass

*You must have the latest update installed before using this costume.

fullgame.name: DEAD OR ALIVE 5 Last Round: Core Fighters

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 870 over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280×720 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 2600 over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920×1080 pixel over True Color ※4K Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
